price: "Sačuvaj Allahu", reče, "da uzmemo nekog drugog do onoga kod koga smo našli ono što je naše! Tada bismo zaista nepravedni bili!"
arabic: قَالَ مَعَاذَ ٱللَّهِ أَن نَّأۡخُذَ إِلَّا مَن وَجَدۡنَا مَتَٰعَنَا عِندَهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla maʿādha al-lahi an nakhudha illā man wajadnā matāʿanā ʿindahu innā idhan laẓālimūna
